question:
You work for an international company, and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country. 
Write a letter to your manager. In your letter
• explain why you want to work in the company's head office for six months
• say how your work could be done while you are away
• ask for his/her help in arranging it
text: I hope my letter finds you well.
I am writing to you on the matter of temporarily changing my current work location, as I would like to relocate in our France's head office for a duration of six months.

As I have been working on artificial intelligence modelling approaches, the reason behind my relocation request is that I am seeking further advancement in this field. France's office is well-known for excellency in this scope of work. As well, it would be a great chance to get in touch with our clients there.

Accordingly, I will be responsible for the work in projects that I am currently responsible for in Cairo office, in terms of coordination and any issues that require immediate technical design actions.

Lastly, I am seeking your kind approval and advice on this matter. Also, I am flexible for any other recommendations that could facilitate my goal towards increasing my artificial intelligence experience.
